content: {"name": "Restoration Christian Ministry Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call +1 (347) 216-7681 to confirm if they are open before going.", "email": "", "url": "https://rcmrestores.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "822 East 233rd Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10466", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.89217, "longitude": -73.854034}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 216-7681", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "1 bag per family/person"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
